notes.note: But notes can appear in more than one category (see third sub category)
Any changes you make to a note will apply to the note in all categories it exists in.

Click on a note to edit it. You can use the icons to:
 - Add / remove categories
 - Set high / low priority
- Move notes up and down 
- Delete note

When adding and removing categories use the arrow icon to jump or down between parent and sub categories. You can add or remove a note from any category or sub category if you navigate through to it correctly. The only exception is you cannot remove the last category from a note. If you want to get rid of a note entirely use the delete button (big red X)
Move notes or categories up or down is done using the up/down arrow icon and clicking the big obvious buttons until it's in the position you want. To escape from moving mode click the middle line.

Add new categories by using the hamburger menu at the top, all other options can be found inside the 3 vertical dot options menu and should be self explanatory. Try messing around with these notes or just delete them all (can delete entire categories) and add your own.
Notes in here are split into categories
Since this is your first time feel free to use these notes as an introduction into using the app. Otherwise, feel free to delete them and start from scratch.

Before starting make sure you install this page as an app. In most browsers click into options/settings and choose either 'install' or 'add to homescreen'. This will add it to your list of apps. Do not try to use in the browser.
Notes can be added directly to a category, or into sub categories. This 'starting off' category has no categories but click on 'See More' below to see some sub categories.
